# Description

Researcher at the IDEA (Inclusion, Diversity, Equity & Access) Center and PhD candidate exploring how inclusive research principles can be applied to the entire scientific process. This includes investigating the systematic barriers and inequalities within open science.

member_name <- "Jule van den Berg"

# custom radar plot

)
